pkgmetadata.longdescription: # qfnnThe "qfnn" (or QuantumFlow Neural Network Library) is a library to support the implementation of [QuantumFlow](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-020-20729-5)and its extensions, including [QF-Mixer](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2109.03806.pdf) and [QF-RobustNN](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2109.03430.pdf).
